questionTitle: I don't ________ what people think about the way I dress.
Everyone ________ from Andrew has accepted our invitation.
After going for a long walk in the morning everyone ________ very hungry at lunch-time.
I haven't seen the film yet and ________.
Steak for breakfast and eggs for supper is ________, to say the least.
The car had a ________ tyre, so we had to change the wheel.
Because it rained very heavily all day they had to ________ the garden party until the following Saturday.
There has been a considerable ________ in Werner's English since he came to Britain.
Do you know ________ you call this in England?
I don't ________ to get married because I like being a bachelor.
Her rudeness upset him, and it took him a long of time to ________ it.
The plane crashed into a bridge because it was flying too ________.
He drove too fast ________ too often and was fined $20.
The young girl carefully ________ left and right before crossing the road.
A new study group has been ________ by the United Nations.
He was found guilty of murder and condemned ________ death.
When he heard the bad news, he broke ________ completely.
The Opposition cannot afford to ________ in such an important matter.
I've never seen her so angry. She's walking round with a face like ________.
Surprisingly, the frontier guards seemed ________ at our presence.
